participant_1.background:
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.
I like to eat sushi when I'm not at the archery center.
I enjoy spending time with my grandchildren and sister, reading, and gardening.
I'd brag about my extensive book collection, which is filled with all the classics and some hidden gems.
i like going to canada.

participant_2.background:
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
I once went on a road trip with Oscar and we saw a lot of cool places.
i am the youngest of 3.
Before I was a mom in telecommunications, I was a sniper in the army.
My biggest fear is not being able to perform my best on stage.

content.text: Hi! What do you like to do for fun?
I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be.
Me too! I have a large garden with lots of different plants.
That sounds wonderful! I live in a small apartment so I can't have a big garden, but I do have a few potted plants.
I also enjoy reading and spending time with my family.
I love reading too! I read a lot of historical fiction and romance novels.
I'm more into mystery and thriller novels.
Have you read any of the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon?
I haven't, but I've heard good things about it.
They're really good! I've read all of them and I'm waiting for the next one to come out.
I'll have to check them out!
You should! They're a lot of fun.
